From: "Daniel Paul Hightower" <dph_of_rules@...>

Golems - Only new attack I could think I was 'Tornado'.  A golem spins 
its body around, allowing it to temporarily go through trees and over 
water.  The attack would hurt opponents who get hit by the golem and 
this new attack would effectively make attacks against Golems count as 
1/2-1/4 their value.  Wait minute, why not give Golems a pinball mode 
attack.  All it would do is roll around and hit objecdts,  This attack 
would give Golems incredible speed.

Giant Skeletons - Definitely 'Split' into 5-6 normal sized skeletons. 
 No inspiration for an original attack.  Maybe if I had more sleep 
[it's not my fault, just the moron I live with], I might be able to 
think of something.

I believe in limiting each character to 4 attacks with possible 
alternates for each attack.  This will keep any character from 
becoming too powerfull.
